definition: "knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
to root out/to eradicate/to sweep away/to abolish

sentences.english: Snow shoveling is a known trigger for heart attacks.
sentences.chinese: 剷雪是一個已知的心臟病發作激發因素。

sentences.english: It's not as demanding as shoveling snow.
The car got stuck in a snowdrift, please help me shovel the snow.
sentences.chinese: 車子陷在雪堆裏了，寶貝幫我一起剷雪吧。

sentences.english: Rear stabilizers are necessary when operating the backhoe.
sentences.chinese: 後方穩定是必要的反剷作業時。

sentences.english: The back boom of a backhoe is one of the key features of this machine.
sentences.chinese: 一個反剷背繁榮是本機的主要特點之一。

sentences.english: The float bucket feature on a backhoe changes the height of the bucket over uneven ground.
sentences.chinese: 反剷上的浮桶功能改變的水桶在不平坦地面的高度。

sentences.english: High aggression will cause the player to make more tackles for example and get involved in play.
sentences.chinese: 比如，高侵略性能夠保證球員更多地剷搶，更加主動。

sentences.english: But spadefuls of earth were already falling all over the body.
sentences.chinese: 但一剷剷的泥土在撒向那具屍體。

sentences.english: But spadefuls of earth were already falling all over the body.
sentences.chinese: 但一剷剷的泥土在撒向那具屍體。

sentences.english: Jason asked him to be outside their house in five minutes and shoveled off the snow.
sentences.chinese: 詹森叫他五分鐘後到他們家的房子外去剷雪。

sentences.english: It had been a ferocious but perfectly legitimate tackle.
sentences.chinese: 這個剷斷很兇狠，但確實是合理的衝撞。

sentences.english: But we could use another backhoe .
sentences.chinese: 我們還可以用另一臺反剷機。

sentences.english: A backhoe is often used in ditching where the soil conditions are usually rough.
sentences.chinese: 在地面凹凸不平地區也常用反剷挖土機挖溝。

sentences.english: Finally an example demonstrates the application of method to the backhoe…
sentences.chinese: 最後給出了液壓挖掘機反剷工作裝置的設計實例。

sentences.english: They chipped the old paint off  from the door.
sentences.chinese: 他們將門上的舊漆剷掉。

definition: operculum (Latin: little lid)/a covering flap (in various branches of anatomy)
to die/to shoot dead/to reject/to fall forward/(suffix) to death
a saw/to cut with a saw
shining metal/(old) the 16th of the month (abbreviation used in telegrams)
